title: Introducing: deer scout
body:
I’m a sucker for this style of music.

Wistless, emotionally fraught and endearingly honest, **deer scout’s** debut EP, **_customs_**, is four tracks of Elliott Smith channeling folk-pop. No frills attached, just searingly authentic songwriting. Check out a couple of tracks below, and grab the full release over at [Bandcamp](https://deerscout.bandcamp.com/).

Like this? Follow our [On Repeat Playlist](https://open.spotify.com/user/crackintheroad/playlist/1UB6gJIZpmiO0H2zmSbg02) for a handpicked selection of the very best in new music; updated weekly.

_one of us is easily replaced_
